mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, HP_NO, HP_NAME, HP_PHONE, HP_POSTCODE, HP_ADDRESS, HP_AVG_RATE, HP_REVIEW, HP_STATUS, HPCATE_NAME FROM( SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_STATUS, LISTAGG(CAST(HG.HPCATE_NAME AS VARCHAR(100)),', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY NULL) AS HPCATE_NAME FROM HOSPITAL HP JOIN HPLIST HL ON (HP.HP_NO = HL.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON (HL.HPCATE_CODE = HG.HPCATE_CODE) GROUP BY HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_STATUS )

SELECT HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_COMMENT, HP.HP_STATUS, LISTAGG(CAST(HG.HPCATE_NAME AS VARCHAR(100)),', ')WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY NULL) AS HPCATE_NAME FROM HOSPITAL HP JOIN HPLIST HL ON (HP.HP_NO = HL.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON (HL.HPCATE_CODE = HG.HPCATE_CODE) WHERE HP.HP_NO = #{hpNo} GROUP BY HP.HP_NO, HP.HP_NAME, HP.HP_PHONE, HP.HP_POSTCODE, HP.HP_ADDRESS, HP.HP_AVG_RATE, HP.HP_REVIEW, HP.HP_COMMENT, HP.HP_STATUS
SELECT DRHP_ORIGIN, DRHP_RENAME FROM DRHPPHOTO WHERE HP_NO=#{hpNo} AND PH_CODE = 4
SELECT BE_HP_NO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAME_FILENAME, PH_CODE, BE_HP_STATUS FROM BEFORE_HPPIC WHERE BE_HP_NO = #{hpNo} ORDER BY PH_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOSPITAL WHERE HP_APPROVAL = 'N'

SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, A.* FROM (SELECT A.HP_NO, A.HP_NAME, A.HP_PHONE, A.HP_POSTCODE, A.HP_ADDRESS, C.HPCATE_CODE, C.HPCATE_NAME, D.ANAME, D.AEMAIL, D.APHONE FROM HOSPITAL A JOIN HPLIST B ON A.HP_NO = B.HP_NO JOIN HPCATEGORY C ON B.HPCATE_CODE = C.HPCATE_CODE JOIN APPLICANT D ON A.HP_NO = D.HP_NO WHERE A.HP_APPROVAL = 'N') A

SELECT A.HP_NO, A.HP_NAME, A.HP_PHONE, A.HP_POSTCODE, A.HP_ADDRESS, B.ANAME, B.AEMAIL, B.APHONE, D.HPCATE_NAME, E.DRHP_RENAME, E.PH_CODE FROM HOSPITAL A JOIN APPLICANT B ON A.HP_NO = B.HP_NO JOIN HPLIST C ON A.HP_NO = C.HP_NO JOIN HPCATEGORY D ON C.HPCATE_CODE = D.HPCATE_CODE JOIN DRHPPHOTO E ON A.HP_NO = E.HP_NO WHERE A.HP_APPROVAL = 'N' AND A.HP_NO = #{hpNo}
